data.title: Thomas C. McGonigle Obituary 2023
authors: Davenport Family Funeral Homes And Crematory
data.meta_description: Thomas C. McGonigle, 85, of Barrington, IL passed away peacefully at Good Shepherd Hospital on February 9, 2023. He was born on October 15, 1937 in Chicago, IL to parents Charle...
data.meta_site_name: Davenport Family Funeral Homes And Crematory
data.text:
Thomas C. McGonigle, 85, of Barrington, IL passed away peacefully at Good Shepherd Hospital on February 9, 2023. He was born on October 15, 1937 in Chicago, IL to parents Charles and Mary McGonigle.

Tom was a man of many loves, most notably his faith and family. He was a member of St. Anne Parish of Barrington where he served as a long-time volunteer.

He earned a scholarship to Northwestern through the Chick Evans Scholars Foundation as a golf caddy. His love for golf continued well into his retirement years and he shared that passion with family and friends. He was also an accomplished sailor and delighted in cruising his sailboat on Lake Michigan and the Caribbean with family and friends (although his wife Betty couldn't swim and was terrified most of the time).

Tom was a Civil Engineer and well-respected business leader serving as Vice-President of Sales for International Harvester before moving on to a distinguished career at Komatsu-Dresser.
